title: Did the Soviet Union Ban Microwaves Due to Health Concerns?
subtitle: This claim has its roots in an unsourced article from a man who likely does not exist, and whose only stated expertise came from working at an alternative bookstore and natural food shop in the 1970s.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Microwave ovens were banned in the USSR in 1976 to protect its citizens from harmful health effects.
